## Context.ContextTokens.contextTokenToPartialContext() method

Converts a [context token](./ts-res.contexttoken.md) to a validated partial context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static contextTokenToPartialContext(token: string, qualifiers: IReadOnlyQualifierCollector): Result<IValidatedContextDecl>;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IValidatedContextDecl](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the validated partial context if successful, `Failure` with an error message if not.
